job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Hello,   Greetings!   This is Akash Kumar from VBeyond Corp.  We are a global recruitment company with specialization in of hiring of IT professionals.  One of our clients is looking for Sr. Site Reliability Engineer in 100% REMOTE    Title : Sr. Site Reliability Engineer  Location : 100% REMOTE  Full time    Job Description :   •             Multi-Cloud operations and support following industry best practices (e.g. AWS Well-Architected Framework) and direct experience in at-scale administration, troubleshooting, and issue remediation in Public and Regulated Cloud Environments (AWS, AWS GovCloud, GCP, Azure, Azure-Jedi) •             3+ years CI/CD and Infrastructure Automation Experience with common platforms (Jenkins, Spinnaker, GitOps) and scripting (Terraform, Pulimi, CloudFormation, Ansible, Helm, Python) •             Self-motivated individual who is interested in expanding their knowledge and skillset while improving on processes, procedures, and approaches that benefit the organization •             A thoughtful individual who strives to find the best possible solutions to problems and the follow-through to see them from idea to execution •             Reliable team player, yet able to work independently, with strong interpersonal and communication skills.  •             At least 2 years of hands-on experience in Docker & Kubernetes, familiarity with KOPS is an advantage •             Experience with Big Data domain technologies such as HDFS, S3, BSpark, BFlink, Presto, Kafka is essential, and deep knowledge is a strong advantage •             Team player, yet able to work independently, with interpersonal and communication skills.  I would appreciate if you could reach out on my below mentioned contact coordinates, should the position be of interest to you.  Have a great day ahead!
